Ability.Description: Leap backwards 20m. Removes all crowd control effects.

Rank.Description: Reduces damage taken by 1%. Increases damage dealt by 1%.
Reduces damage taken by 2%. Increases damage dealt by 2%.
Reduces damage taken by 3%. Increases damage dealt by 3%.
Increases your Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 2%.
Increases your Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 4%.
Increases your Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 6%.
Increases your Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 8%.
Increases your Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 10%.
Hitting with Lightning Torrent, Storm Torrent or Charged Pulse causes Builders and Double Pulse to deal an additional 4% damage for 15s.
Hitting with Lightning Torrent, Storm Torrent or Charged Pulse causes Builders and Double Pulse to deal an additional 8% damage for 15s.
Hitting with Lightning Torrent, Storm Torrent or Charged Pulse causes Builders and Double Pulse to deal an additional 12% damage for 15s.
Hitting with Skyfall causes your attacks to bypass 5% of the target’s armor and resistances for 15 seconds.
Hitting with Skyfall causes your attacks to bypass 10% of the target’s armor and resistances for 15 seconds.

Ability.Description: Heals the Warrior for 1261 health over the next 6s.

Ability.Description: Absorbs 50% of damage taken up to 2757 damage. Lasts 30s. This Ability is not affected by the Global Cooldown.
